snippet: Li Ning, the Chinese retailer of athletic footwear and clothing, has removed its chief executive as it seeks to reverse falling profits in a highly saturated marketplace.
abstract: Li Ning, the Chinese retailer of athletic footwear and clothing, removes its chief executive Zhang Zhi Yong as it seeks to reverse falling profits in a highly saturated marketplace; company founder and former Olympic gold medalist Li Ning will expand his duties as chairman.
lead_paragraph: Li Ning, the Chinese retailer of athletic footwear and clothing, has removed its chief executive as it seeks to reverse falling profits in a highly saturated marketplace.

headline.main: Chinese Apparel Firm Addresses Falling Profits
headline.print_headline: Chinese Apparel Firm Addresses Falling Profits
